other_tests.findings: Supraventricular tachycardia with atrial and ventricular rates of 131 beats per minute, diffuse, nonspecific ST-segment and T-wave abnormalities; QT interval was 276 msec, with a QT interval corrected for heart rate (QTc) of 407 msec.
Cystoisospora belli oocysts detected in a wet preparation after concentration of the stool specimen.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Finding was confirmed by examination of a smear treated with a modified acid-fast stain.
